alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Grant; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 6:58AM CDT until June 05 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Noble County in northern Oklahoma... South central Grant County in northern Oklahoma... Central Garfield County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 745 AM CDT. * At 658 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kremlin, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Enid, Pond Creek, Garber, Covington, Kremlin, Breckenridge, Hunter, Fairmont, Douglas and North Enid. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
